reviewText: I always planned to breastfeed my girls anyway so i didn't really need to be convinced of the benefits of breastfeeding. But after viewing this program I had no doubts at all. It provides compelling and convincing information about why breastfeeding is the best source of nutrition for your baby. If you have a friend or know someone who's "on the fence", this is the perfect program for them.

As a new mother, this program and the How To program were inspiring.

I realized I did not know the benefits of breastfeeding and I realized I was not alone.
I was given this film to watch by a friend and I found it made a big difference in teaching me about why it is important to breastfeed my baby. Very informative and helpful!
